questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

A company is evaluating Microsoft 365 collaboration solutions.

You need to describe the features of various Microsoft Viva solutions.

Match each Microsoft Viva app to its description.

To answer, drag the appropriate Microsoft Viva app from the column on the left to its description on the right. Each Microsoft Viva app may be used once, more than once, or not at all.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

HOTSPOT
-

A to determine the appropriate application applications of Microsoft 365.

You need to determine the appropriate application for a given scenario.

Select the answer that correctly completes the sentence.

//IMG//

You need to consider the underlined segment to establish whether it is accurate.
Your company has a Microsoft Office 365 subscription.
As an administrator for this subscription, you want to check what the repercussions are if the availability terms of the Microsoft Office 365 services are not satisfied.
You analyze the Service Level agreement.
Select `No adjustment required` if the underlined segment is accurate. If the underlined segment is inaccurate, select the accurate option.

discussion.content: Opção A. a empresa tem confiança de que o contrato existente com a Microsoft estabelece os termos e condições adequados, as obrigações e as ações que serão tomadas em caso de não conformidade com os Acordos de Nível de Serviço (SLAs) e, portanto, não é necessário fazer ajustes ou modificações no contrato neste momento.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct indeed
SLA is the magic word here.
A. Service Level Agreement for Microsoft Online Services

first one seems to be a no, there is a function in Dynamics 365 with custom forms but is not related to MS Forms
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/sales/add-sms-option-custom-forms

Second one looks good
https://support.microsoft.com/en-gb/office/can-someone-without-a-microsoft-account-take-my-survey-or-quiz-41d26559-8fa9-4e3d-b88e-0bb316764e0e#:~:text=Yes.,as%20part%20of%20your%20questionnaire.

3rd one looks good

https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/msoffice/forum/all/what-happens-when-forms-owner-leaves-the-company/82a836a7-1852-4f1a-a087-046dcbc9be17

comments.content: Agreed, Microsoft Forms can only send SMS using a connector. It's not built in.
